fields.text: Are you sure that you want to start a new game and that all players have already taken a seat?

info.name: Golderymander
info.attribution:
Room layout, custom game pieces, scripting and metadata game picture by Nicolas Weiss / PaladinOfCats, under a CCBY 3.0 licence.
http://paladinofcats.free.fr/vtio.htm

Extra scripting help from Andy Pymont, under the licence of the generosity of his heart.
info.description: Simultaneously delimitate areas and secure a majority influence in them with your (face-down!) control markers, in order to secure shiny chunks of gold.
info.helpText:
• Click on the lines between board spaces to raise/erase walls.
• In order to curb down memory issues, player tiles are displayed face up to their owner only once slotted in the board. Other people will see the tiles as face down.

fields.text: Are you sure that you want to reveal everyone's tiles?
